short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up Wikipedia without switching windows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have a question but don’t want to risk losing your thoughts by switching tabs?

Are you working on one screen and find it inconvenient to switch tabs to look something up?

Do you enjoy using Wikipedia?

Then you’ll love Wiki Helper!

Wiki Helper is a free Chrome extension that brings the Wikipedia experience to the corner of your screen.

Download now and make your browsing more convenient!
